short_summary: Supply, delivery and offloading of bread and bakery products
description: Purchase of fresh bread, rolls & miscellaneous other bakery products on an as and when requested basis.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Title
 EC095-230022 (OCPR) Pain et petits pains

### Solicitation Number
 WS4085764426

### Publication Date
 August 21, 2023

### Closing Date
 August 25, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT

### Procurement Category
 Goods and Services

### Procurement Method
 Competitive – Open Bidding

### Notice Type
 Request for Standing Offer (OCPR)

### Contracting Entity
 Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Regions of Delivery
 Canada
 Nova Scotia
 Newfoundland and Labrador
 New Brunswick

### Valued Items
 Fresh bread, rolls, and miscellaneous bakery products

### Solicitation Overview

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is seeking a Regional Master Standing Offer (OCPR) for the supply, delivery, and offloading of various quantities of fresh bread, rolls, and miscellaneous bakery products. The successful contractor will be required to provide products to various government departments through PWGSC’s Atlantic Region, based on their requirements.

### Key Details
* Awarding Party: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Total Budget: [To be provided in the Rfp]
* Canada Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies
* This RFP is for a Naval Standing Offer (NATO)

### Contact Information
Andrew MacFarlane
andrew.macfarlane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
PWGSC
11 Laurier Street, Phys III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada

### Notice URL
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17222326?extsite=MTcyMjIzMjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Attachments
None

Please note that any attachments mentioned in the original text have been omitted in this rewritten version.

The closing date is **firm and final**. Late submissions will not be considered or accepted. Only submissions that meet all requirements and conform to the requirements outlined in the RFP package will be considered. Any questions or enquiries should be sent to the contact person mentioned above.
